verses.verse: Revelation <S%G602><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> To Shew <S%G1166><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> To His Bondmen <S%G846><s%> What Things <S%G3739><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> Take Place <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Shortly : <S%G5034><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Signified It, <S%G4591><s%> Having Sent <S%G649><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G32><s%> His Angel <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> To His Bondman <S%G846><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Testified <S%G3140><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Testimony <S%G3141><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Whatsoever Things <S%G3745><s%> And <S%G5037><s%> He Saw. <S%G1492><s%>

Blessed Is <S%G3107><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Reads, <S%G314><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They That <S%G3588><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Keep <S%G5083><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Written; <S%G1125><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Time Is <S%G2540><s%> Near. <S%G1451><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> Which Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Asia : <S%G773><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Him <S%G3588><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is <S%G5607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> To Come; <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2362><s%> His Throne; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Witness <S%G3144><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faithful, <S%G4103><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Firstborn <S%G4416><s%> From Among <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead. <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ruler <S%G758><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%> To Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Washed <S%G3068><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Our Sins <S%G2257><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G129><s%> His Blood, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Priests <S%G2409><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> His : <S%G846><s%> To Him Be <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Might <S%G2904><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> He Comes <S%G2064><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Clouds, <S%G3507><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall See <S%G3700><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Eye, <S%G3788><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Which <S%G3748><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Pierced, <S%G1574><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Wail <S%G2875><s%> ' On Account Of <S%G1909><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tribes <S%G5443><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S The 3588 T-NSN Alpha 1 N-LI And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSN Omega 5598 N-LI Beginning 746 N-NSF And 2532 CONJ, Ending, 5056 N-NSN Says 3004 V-PAI-3S The 3588 T-NSM Lord, 2962 N-NSM Who 3588 T-NSM Is 5607 V-PXP-NSM And 2532 CONJ Who 3588 T-NSM Was 2258 V-IXI-3S And 2532 CONJ Who Is 3588 T-NSM To Come, 2064 V-PNP-NSM The 3588 T-NSM Almighty. 3841 N-NSM

I 1473 P-1NS John, 2491 N-NSM Who 3588 T-NSM Also 2532 CONJ Brother 80 N-NSM Your 5216 P-2GP And 2532 CONJ Fellow Partaker 4791 A-NSM In 1722 PREP The 3588 T-DSF Tribulation 2347 N-DSF And 2532 CONJ In 1722 PREP The 3588 T-DSF Kingdom 932 N-DSF And 2532 CONJ Endurance 5281 N-DSF Of Jesus 2424 N-GSM, Christ, 5547 N-GSM Was 1096 V-2ADI-1S In 1722 PREP The 3588 T-DSF Island 3520 N-DSF Which Is 3588 T-DSF Called 2564 V-PPP-DSF Patmos, 3963 N-DSF Because Of 1223 PREP The 3588 T-ASM Word 3056 N-ASM Of 3588 T-GSM God 2316 N-GSM And 2532 CONJ Because Of 1223 PREP The 3588 T-ASF Testimony 3141 N-ASF Of Jesus 2424 N-GSM Christ. 5547 N-GSM

I Became <S%G1096><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord's <S%G2960><s%> Day, <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> Behind <S%G3694><s%> Me <S%G3450><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Of A Trumpet, <S%G4536><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S The 3588 T-NSN Alpha 1 N-LI And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSN, Omega 5598 N-LI The 3588 T-NSM First 4413 A-NSM And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSM Last; 2078 A-NSM And, 2532 CONJ What 3739 R-ASN Thou Seest 991 V-PAI-2S Write 1125 V-AAM-2S In 1519 PREP A Book, 975 N-ASN And 2532 CONJ Send 3992 V-AAM-2S To The 3588 T-DPF Assemblies 1577 N-DPF Which Are 3588 T-DPF In 1722 PREP, Asia : 773 N-DSF To 1519 PREP Ephesus, 2181 N-ASF And 2532 CONJ To 1519 PREP Smyrna, 4667 N-ASF And 2532 CONJ To 1519 PREP Pergamos, 4010 N-ASF And 2532 CONJ To 1519 PREP Thyatira, 2363 N-APN And 2532 CONJ To 1519 PREP Sardis, 4554 N-APF And 2532 CONJ To 1519 PREP Philadelphia, 5359 N-ASF And 2532 CONJ To 1519 PREP Laodicea. 2993 N-ASF

And <S%G2532><s%> I Turned <S%G1994><s%> To See <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Turned <S%G1994><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Lampstands <S%G3087><s%> Golden, <S%G5552><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Lampstands One <S%G3087><s%> Like The <S%G3664><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of Man, <S%G444><s%> Clothed In A Garment <S%G1746><s%> Reaching To The Feet, <S%G4158><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Girt About With <S%G4024><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Breasts <S%G3149><s%> A Girdle <S%G2223><s%> Golden : <S%G5552><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet <S%G846><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> Fine Brass, <S%G5474><s%> As If <S%G5613><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Furnace They <S%G2575><s%> Glowed; <S%G4448><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5456><s%> His Voice <S%G846><s%> As The <S%G5613><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of Waters <S%G5204><s%> Many, <S%G4183><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Right <S%G1188><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Stars <S%G792><s%> Seven, <S%G2033><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> His Mouth <S%G846><s%> A Sword <S%G4501><s%> Two Edged <S%G1366><s%> Sharp <S%G3691><s%> Going Forth, <S%G1607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3799><s%> His Countenance <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun <S%G2246><s%> Shines <S%G5316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1411><s%> Its Power. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> I Fell <S%G4098><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Dead : <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Laid <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1188><s%> His Right <S%G846><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Me, <S%G1691><s%>, Saying <S%G3004><s%>, To Me, <S%G3427><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Fear Not; <S%G5399><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S The 3588 T-NSM First 4413 A-NSM And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NSM Last, 2078 A-NSM

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Living One : <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Became <S%G1096><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%> Alive <S%G2198><s%> I Am <S%G1510><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages, <S%G165><s%> Amen <S%G281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Keys <S%G2807><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Hades <S%G86><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Death. <S%G2288><s%>

Write <S%G1125><s%> The Things Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Sawest <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things Which <S%G3739><s%> Are, <S%G1526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things Which <S%G3739><s%> Are About <S%G3195><s%> To Take Place <S%G1096><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These. <S%G5023><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Mystery <S%G3466><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Stars <S%G792><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Sawest <S%G1492><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> Right <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G1188><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Lampstands <S%G3087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Golden. <S%G5552><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Stars <S%G792><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> Are; <S%G1526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Lampstands <S%G3087><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Sawest <S%G1492><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> Are. <S%G1526><s%>
